text: Hey everyone, Metova is hiring more Android developers. These will be onsite positions only right now though, either Fayetteville AR, Conway AR, or Franklin TN. We’ve got a great group already so you’d have a lot of resources to get plugged in, and a lot of opportunity to learn and grow as a developer. You can check out our jobs page if you are interested <https://metova.com/jobs/>

attachments.service_name: Mobile App Development Services - Android, iPhone, iPad & Web | Metova, Inc.
attachments.title: Mobile Development Jobs at Metova - iOS, Android, Ruby
attachments.text: Looking for a career in mobile development? Here are the job openings at Metova and why you should apply.
